Literature.Title: Membrane Interactions of Natural Cyclic Lipodepsipeptides of the Viscosin Group.
Literature.Author: Geudens N, Nasir MN, Crowet JM, Raaijmakers JM, Fehér K, Coenye T, Martins JC, Lins L, Sinnaeve D, Deleu M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis LMG 8222(MIC50=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes LMG 15868(MIC50=2µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae LMG 21598(MIC50=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 9431(MIC50=8µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ET067(MIC50=8µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis LMG 10267(MIC50=8µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes LMG 16711(MIC50=4µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens NCTC 8798(MIC50=8µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC11178(MIC50=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC50=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LMG 10147(MIC50=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC50=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ET199(MIC50=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ET086(MIC50=>32µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus IHEM 17907(MIC50=>32µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>32µg/ml)
